attributes.action: Stop the slow extinction of our Royal Mail & Post office services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the closure of so many Post Offices. We no longer have the "Royal Mail" service bearing our monarch's face. It is no longer on her Majesty's service that mail is delivered;slowly dying under the growth of private companies. Please bring it back as a national service. Numerous Post Offices are suffering closure, leaving many towns without one. To send parcels or overseas mail requires distance travelling. Please save one of our much relied upon institutions; the post.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
